properties.name: otel.traces.exporter
properties.description: OpenTelemetry traces exporter (none, otlp, jaeger, zipkin).

properties.name: otel.metrics.exporter
properties.description: OpenTelemetry metrics exporter (none, otlp, prometheus).

properties.name: otel.logs.exporter
properties.description: OpenTelemetry logs exporter (none, otlp).

properties.name: auth.enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable authentication.

properties.name: auth.email
properties.description: JWT claim path for extracting user email.

properties.name: auth.client
properties.description: OAuth2 client ID for interactive login.

properties.name: auth.client-secret
properties.description: OAuth2 client secret for interactive login.

properties.name: stream.enabled
properties.description: Enable Spring Cloud Stream messaging.

properties.name: schedule.enabled
properties.description: Deploy price schedule update beans.

properties.name: beancounter.enricher
properties.description: Default asset enricher (ALPHA, FIGI, DEFAULT, PRIVATE).

properties.name: beancounter.currency.base
properties.description: System base ISO currency code.

properties.name: resilience4j.ratelimiter.instances.alphaVantage.registerHealthIndicator
properties.description: Register health indicator for AlphaVantage rate limiter.

properties.name: resilience4j.ratelimiter.instances.alphaVantage.limitForPeriod
properties.description: Number of calls allowed per period for AlphaVantage.

properties.name: resilience4j.ratelimiter.instances.alphaVantage.limitRefreshPeriod
properties.description: Period for AlphaVantage rate limit refresh.

properties.name: resilience4j.ratelimiter.instances.alphaVantage.timeoutDuration
properties.description: Timeout duration for AlphaVantage rate limit.

properties.name: resilience4j.ratelimiter.instances.alphaVantage.eventConsumerBufferSize
properties.description: Event consumer buffer size for AlphaVantage rate limiter.

properties.name: resilience4j.ratelimiter.instances.morningstar.registerHealthIndicator
properties.description: Register health indicator for Morningstar rate limiter.

properties.name: resilience4j.ratelimiter.instances.morningstar.limitForPeriod
properties.description: Number of calls allowed per period for Morningstar.

properties.name: resilience4j.ratelimiter.instances.morningstar.limitRefreshPeriod
properties.description: Period for Morningstar rate limit refresh.

properties.name: resilience4j.ratelimiter.instances.morningstar.timeoutDuration
properties.description: Timeout duration for Morningstar rate limit.

properties.name: resilience4j.ratelimiter.instances.morningstar.eventConsumerBufferSize
properties.description: Event consumer buffer size for Morningstar rate limiter.

properties.name: resilience4j.ratelimiter.instances.fxRates.registerHealthIndicator
properties.description: Register health indicator for FX rates rate limiter.

properties.name: resilience4j.ratelimiter.instances.fxRates.limitForPeriod
properties.description: Number of calls allowed per period for FX rates.

properties.name: resilience4j.ratelimiter.instances.fxRates.limitRefreshPeriod
properties.description: Period for FX rates rate limit refresh.

properties.name: resilience4j.ratelimiter.instances.fxRates.timeoutDuration
properties.description: Timeout duration for FX rates rate limit.

properties.name: resilience4j.ratelimiter.instances.fxRates.eventConsumerBufferSize
properties.description: Event consumer buffer size for FX rates rate limiter.

properties.name: resilience4j.circuitbreaker.configs.default.failureRateThreshold
properties.description: Failure rate threshold percentage for circuit breaker.

properties.name: resilience4j.circuitbreaker.configs.default.slidingWindowSize
properties.description: Sliding window size for circuit breaker.

properties.name: resilience4j.circuitbreaker.configs.default.permittedNumberOfCallsInHalfOpenState
properties.description: Number of calls permitted in half-open state.

properties.name: resilience4j.circuitbreaker.configs.default.slidingWindowType
properties.description: Sliding window type (COUNT_BASED or TIME_BASED).

properties.name: resilience4j.circuitbreaker.configs.default.waitDurationInOpenState
properties.description: Duration to wait in open state.

properties.name: resilience4j.circuitbreaker.configs.default.registerHealthIndicator
properties.description: Register health indicator for circuit breaker.

properties.name: resilience4j.circuitbreaker.configs.default.recordFailurePredicate
properties.description: Fully qualified class name of failure predicate.

properties.name: resilience4j.retry.instances.backend.maxRetryAttempts
properties.description: Maximum retry attempts for backend.

properties.name: resilience4j.retry.instances.backend.waitDuration
properties.description: Wait duration between retries.

properties.name: resilience4j.retry.instances.backend.enableExponentialBackoff
properties.description: Enable exponential backoff for retries.

properties.name: resilience4j.retry.instances.backend.exponentialBackoffMultiplier
properties.description: Multiplier for exponential backoff.
